intro.text: Happy to have you as part of our team!!
I would like to remind you of the secrecy clause in your contract!
The existence of The Copperfield Department is highly confidential.
Any breach of contract will waive your claim to physical integrity.
Mister Tery Waldberg will be in touch with you regarding your first assignment.

firstDayFeedbackPositive.text: We were able to confirm that the person you flagged,
Thank you for keeping our company save!

firstDayFeedbackNegative.text: You don't seem to take your work seriously!
After going through every personal belonging of the person you flagged,
we couldn't find a single hint linking them to the account.
I truly hope for your own sake, that this failure was an anomaly!
Luckily our department has some, at least somewhat competent, employees
and we were able to arrange the appropriate consequences for the person,
who was hiding behind the account.

phoneReminderPostNotAdded.text: Please add the suspicious post to the pinboard, using the computer!

phoneReminderPersonNotAdded.text: Hello, You haven't added the people from the suspect list to the pinboard!
Do this with the help of the computer!

phoneReminderNothingAdded.text: Hi, you have neither added all suspects nor the suspicious post to the pinboard!
Do this with the help of the computer!

phoneCallIntro.text: Hello again, I forgot to mention:
you can use this pinboard to structure your thoughts.
Look at a pinned element to see further information about it!
Click on an element to move it around!
You can connect elements with a thread.
Connect Olga to the suspicious account, named 'imar'!
Now connect Imar  to the same account!
You can delete elements from the pinboard, by clicking on the pin.
You can not only accuse a person on the Computer but also here.
Accuse a person, by connecting them to the mystery post it.

phoneCallIntro2.text: You can connect elements with a thread.
Connect Olga to the suspicious account, named 'imar'!
Now connect Imar  to the same account!
You can delete elements from the pinboard, by clicking on the pin
You can not only accuse a person on the Computer but also here.
Accuse a person, by connecting them to the mystery post it.

exit.text: Hey, now that you have accused somebody, you can leave through the door.
You can still change your selection.
Once your done you can leave the office to end the day and lock in your selection.
